name: Rubber Chicken
description:
Description will come later (to keep mystery until the end of the GameJam ^^). 

Keyboard / Mouse  :

  • Left mouse button / Space key : A
  • Right mouse button / CTRL: B
  • Return: Start
  • Backspace (title screen): Hardcore mode 

Gamepad (Xbox Controller Layout)  :

  • A button: A
  • B button: B
  • Start button: Start
  • Select button (title screen): Hardcore mode

Note: This game has been developed for the Potat0s Jam 4 (theme: Hell)
